## API

check [https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/style-spec/#layers](https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/style-spec/#layers) for description

### props

| props       | type     | required | default                    | description                                       |
| ----------- | -------- | -------- | -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| id          | `String` |          | `"mgl-layer-${this._uid}"` | layer id                                          |
| type        | `String` |          |                            | layer type                                        |
| metadata    | `Object` |          |                            |                                                   |
| sourceId    | `String` |          |                            | using which source                                |
| sourceLayer | `String` |          |                            |                                                   |
| minzoom     | `Number` |          |                            |                                                   |
| maxzoom     | `Number` |          |                            |                                                   |
| filter      | `Array`  |          |                            |                                                   |
| paint       | `Object` |          |                            |                                                   |
| layout      | `Object` |          |                            |                                                   |
| before      | `String` |          |                            | layer order, this layer should before which layer |
